mapper.select: select no, title, id, content, createdate, viewcount from(select rownum as rnum, no, title, id, content, createdate, viewcount from(select * from freeboard order by no asc)) where ((select Count(*) from freeboard)-((#{page}-1)*10)) >= rnum and rnum > ((select Count(*) from freeboard)-(#{page}*10)) order by rnum desc
mapper.insert:
SELECT freeboard_seq.nextval FROM DUAL
insert into freeboard values(#{no},#{title},#{id},#{content},default,default)
mapper.update: update freeboard set viewcount=viewcount+1 where no=#{no}
update freeboard set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where id=#{id} and no=#{no}
mapper.delete: delete from freeboard where no=#{no} and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from freefile where uuid=#{uuid} and name=#{name}
